Documentation.long_help: This filter will take a vtkTable object and reshape it. This filter essentially treats vtkTables as 2D matrices and reshapes them using numpy.reshape in a C contiguous manner. Unfortunately, data fields will be renamed arbitrarily because VTK data arrays require a name.
Documentation.short_help: This filter will take a vtkTable object and reshape it. This filter essentially treats vtkTables as 2D matrices and reshapes them using numpy.reshape in a C contiguous manner. Unfortunately, data fields will be renamed arbitrarily because VTK data arrays require a name.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.default_values:
from PVGPpy.filt import reshapeTable
pdi = self.GetInput() #vtkTable pdo = self.GetOutput() #vtkTable
reshapeTable(pdi, nrows, ncols, pdo=pdo)
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs.
